title: On the performance of seizure prediction machine learning methods across different databases: the sample and alarm-based perspectives
details: I Andrade, C Teixeira, M Pinto - Frontiers in Neuroscience, 2024
abstract: Epilepsy affects 1% of the global population, with approximately one-third of patients resistant to anti-seizure medications (ASMs), posing risks of physical injuries and psychological issues. Seizure prediction algorithms aim to enhance the quality of life …
